description.para: Connects a file system on the storage medium with name space of global file system.

param.param_note: Sets the file system type of installed storage device. For example, msdos means msdos file system. tftpfs means tfs file system.

Represents the location of global file system space that the file system connects to. "/" represents the root directory of global file system. When the system does not have the file system installed, you must first install a root file system on "/".
A device in the system that stores the file system, for example hard drive partition.
